Class GamePoint

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.GamePoint
public final class GamePoint extends Object
Represents a 2D point with integer coordinates. This class is immutable and replaces java.awt.Point to decouple from AWT.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GamePoint(int x, int y)
    Creates a new GamePoint with the specified coordinates.
    GamePoint(GamePoint other)
    Creates a new GamePoint by copying another GamePoint.

    • translate

      public GamePoint translate(int dx, int dy)
      Returns a new GamePoint that is translated by the specified offsets. Since this class is immutable, this method returns a new instance rather than modifying the current one.
      Parameters:
      dx - the x offset
      dy - the y offset
      Returns:
      a new GamePoint with translated coordinates

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this point.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string in the format "GamePoint(x, y)"
